title: ‘It’s wide open' - Murphy on who will win race for the Premier League top four
description: Manchester United, Chelsea & Liverpool - or someone else? MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy on who will join leaders Man City in the Premier League top four.

title: England Rugby condemns online threats sent to Genge
description: England Rugby condemns social media abuse directed at its players after Ellis Genge said he had been sent death threats following the Six Nations defeat by Wales.

title: Why LGBT+ History Month matters to athletes
description: Swimmer Michael Gunning, racing driver Charlie Martin and rugby union player Florence Williams speak about why LGBT+ History Month matters.

title: '100% nailed-on penalty' - Solskjaer fears referees are being swayed by 'outside influences'
description: Manchester United boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer says his side should have had a "100% nailed-on" penalty in the goalless draw with Chelsea and blames "outside influences" for it not being given.

title: Denver family wows neighbourhood with snow art
description: The Mosley family spent 10 hours creating this colourful snake sculpture out of snow.

title: Afghanistan: A year of violence on the road to peace
description: On the anniversary of the US-Taliban deal, Afghanistan finds itself in a precarious state.
